author: rcmatthews
msg: Extracted out drawing and layout of controls from the WindowBorder so the style can be replaced at runtime.

author: dkhaywood
msg: discovered bug in one of the facets in calling incorrect overloaded version of InvokeUtils (NakedObject vs Object).  So have removed overloading from InvokeUtils and provided equivalent functionality in new NakedObjectInvokeUtils, and impacted all facets to use this as appropriate.  Also removed some duplicate functionality in InvokeUtils itself

author: dkhaywood
msg: update to eclipse templates in maven archetype

author: dkhaywood
msg: renamed makePersistent -> persist and disposeInstance -> remove (but preserved ADO#makePersistent() and ADO#disposeInstance(), still deprecated
